channel.title: Invasion on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Invasion on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Humanity Faces Its Biggest Fight Yet in ‘Invasion’ — Here’s When to Stream the Sci-Fi Series’ Third Season Online
item.description: The sci-fi series follows the near-destruction of Earth through the eyes of people around the world, including a JASA communications specialist, a mother of two, a Navy Seal and more.

item.title: Invasion S3 trailer hints the series is finally finding its stride
item.description: “Whatever happened before is just the beginning. What I saw is new, more powerful. And they’re not done.”
